post.description:
Request a nonce for wallet authentication.

This nonce must be signed by the wallet and submitted to /auth/login.
The nonce expires after 5 minutes.

Login with wallet signature.

The user must first request a nonce, sign it with their wallet,
and submit the signature here.

Refresh access token using refresh token.

Submit a valid refresh token to get new access and refresh tokens.

get.description: Get current authenticated user information.

post.description:
Logout current user.

Note: JWT tokens are stateless, so this endpoint is mainly for
client-side token cleanup. In production, you may want to:
- Add the token to a blacklist (requires Redis)
- Revoke refresh tokens

schema.title: Response Logout Api V1 Auth Logout Post

get.description:
List redemption requests with filters and pagination.

Requires: read:redemption permission

List redemptions pending approval.

Requires: approve:redemption permission

Get redemption statistics.

Requires: read:redemption permission

schema.title: Response Get Redemption Stats Api V1 Redemptions Stats Get

get.description:
Get detailed information for a redemption request.

Includes full timeline of events.

Requires: read:redemption permission

post.description:
Approve or reject a redemption request.

Actions:
- APPROVE: Approve the redemption for settlement
- REJECT: Reject the redemption with reason

Requires: approve:redemption permission

schema.title: Response Approve Redemption Api V1 Redemptions  Redemption Id  Approve Post

post.description:
Trigger manual settlement for a redemption.

Normally settlements are processed automatically at settlement_time.
This endpoint allows manual trigger for:
- Approved redemptions ready for settlement
- Force settlement if needed (admin only)

Requires: settle:redemption permission

get.description:
List approval tickets with filters and pagination.

Requires: read:approval permission

List pending tickets that the current user can approve.

Returns tickets sorted by SLA deadline (most urgent first).

Requires: approve:approval permission

Get approval workflow statistics.

Requires: read:approval permission

Get audit log entries.

Returns the most recent entries first.

Requires: audit:read permission

schema.title: Response Get Audit Log Api V1 Approvals Audit Get

get.description:
Get detailed information for an approval ticket.

Includes risk assessment and all approval records.

Requires: read:approval permission

post.description:
Process an approval or rejection action.

Actions:
- APPROVE: Approve the ticket (may require multiple approvals)
- REJECT: Reject the ticket with reason

Requires: approve:approval permission

schema.title: Response Process Approval Action Api V1 Approvals  Ticket Id  Action Post

post.description:
Cancel a pending approval ticket.

Only pending or partially approved tickets can be cancelled.

Requires: The requester or an admin can cancel.

schema.title: Response Cancel Ticket Api V1 Approvals  Ticket Id  Cancel Post

post.description:
Manually trigger escalation check for pending tickets.

Normally runs automatically on a schedule.

Requires: admin:approval permission

schema.title: Response Trigger Escalation Check Api V1 Approvals Check Escalation Post

post.description:
Manually trigger expiration check for pending tickets.

Normally runs automatically on a schedule.

Requires: admin:approval permission

schema.title: Response Trigger Expiration Check Api V1 Approvals Check Expired Post

post.description:
Calculate deviation from target ratios.

Returns deviation information for each tier.

Preview a rebalancing plan without executing.

Generates a plan that shows what steps would be taken.

Manually trigger rebalancing.

Creates and optionally approves a rebalance plan.

schema.title: Response Trigger Manual Rebalance Api V1 Rebalancing Trigger Manual Post

post.description:
Evaluate all triggers without executing.

Returns which triggers would fire given current state.

schema.title: Response Evaluate Triggers Api V1 Rebalancing Trigger Evaluate Post

post.description:
Automatically trigger rebalancing if needed.

Evaluates triggers and creates a plan if any fire.

schema.title: Response Trigger Automatic Rebalance Api V1 Rebalancing Trigger Automatic Post

get.description: Get a rebalance plan by ID.

post.description: Approve a rebalance plan for execution.

post.description: Cancel a rebalance plan.

schema.title: Response Cancel Plan Api V1 Rebalancing Plan  Plan Id  Cancel Post

post.description:
Execute an approved rebalance plan.

Submits transactions and tracks execution.

schema.title: Response Execute Plan Api V1 Rebalancing Execute Post

get.description: Get execution status by ID.

get.description: Get trigger evaluation history.

schema.title: Response Get Trigger History Api V1 Rebalancing History Triggers Get

get.description: Get rebalancing statistics.

get.description:
Get fund overview.

Returns AUM, NAV, supply, and holder information.
Uses FF_FUND_OVERVIEW_SOURCE feature flag.
Cached for 60 seconds.

Get yield metrics.

Returns APY across different time periods.
Uses FF_YIELD_METRICS_SOURCE feature flag.
Cached for 5 minutes.

Get NAV history.

Returns historical NAV data points for charting.
Uses FF_NAV_HISTORY_SOURCE feature flag.
Cached for 5 minutes.

Get asset allocations.

Returns detailed breakdown of fund assets.
Uses FF_ASSET_ALLOCATION_SOURCE feature flag.
Cached for 5 minutes.

schema.title: Response Get Asset Allocations Api V1 Fund Allocations Assets Get

get.description:
Get liquidity tier allocations.

Returns allocation breakdown by liquidity tier.
Uses FF_TIER_ALLOCATION_SOURCE feature flag.
Cached for 5 minutes.

schema.title: Response Get Tier Allocations Api V1 Fund Allocations Tiers Get

get.description:
Get fee structure.

Returns fund fee information.
Cached for 1 hour.

Get performance metrics.

Returns returns, volatility, and risk-adjusted metrics.
Uses FF_YIELD_METRICS_SOURCE feature flag.
Cached for 5 minutes.

Get fund flow metrics.

Returns subscription and redemption flow data.
Uses FF_FLOW_METRICS_SOURCE feature flag.
Cached for 1 minute.
